price: 93. Kaadu Nabiyow ixxic: faylaa kee qaxmeqe saare lem Yalla, usuk isi astooti sin aybulleeleeh cakkii kee baatil inkih siinih tascase ixxigah tet aaxigetton, kaadu ku-Rabbi isin abba haytaanamak garcite hinnaay sin elle galte-le Qhiyaamah ayro.
arabic: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ فَتَعۡرِفُونَهَاۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waquli al-ḥamdu lillahi sayurīkum āyātihi fataʿrifūnahā wamā rabbuka bighāfilin ʿammā taʿmalūna
